headings.usage: Use for all H1-H3. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all body text, inputs, and data tables.

mono.usage: Use for API keys, logs, and technical data.

rules: Use Signal Orange for primary CTAs only.
Backgrounds should be white or very light cool grey (#F8FAFC).

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg shadow-primary/20 rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.outline: border-2 border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground rounded-md px-4 py-2 transition-all

cards.base: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300
cards.interactive: cursor-pointer hover:border-primary/20 hover:shadow-lg hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300

inputs.base: flex h-11 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 transition-all

status_badges.success: bg-emerald-100 text-emerald-700 border border-emerald-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-semibold
status_badges.warning: bg-amber-100 text-amber-700 border border-amber-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-semibold
status_badges.error: bg-red-100 text-red-700 border border-red-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-semibold
status_badges.neutral: bg-slate-100 text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-semibold

rules: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for normal text.
Use focus-visible rings for keyboard navigation.
All interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present.
Do not rely on color alone for status (use icons + text).

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the 'Chivo' font for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Use 'Public Sans' for body text. Import it from Google Fonts.
Implement the Sidebar layout for the dashboard.
Use the 'Deep Navy' (#0F172A) as the primary brand color.
Ensure all cards have generous padding (p-6 or p-8).
Use 'Signal Orange' (#F97316) for the main 'Create Campaign' or 'Send' buttons.
Do not use default Shadcn radius. Use rounded-xl for cards and rounded-md for buttons.
Add a subtle 'noise' texture to the sidebar background if possible, or keep it solid slate-50.
For the 'Events' and 'Contacts' tables, use a clean, borderless table style with hover effects on rows.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'SaaS Blue'. Stick to the Navy/Orange/Emerald palette.
Don't center everything. Use left alignment for text to improve readability.
Ensure all interactive elements have a 'data-testid'.
Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar and Header structure.
